segments.text: I see a disaster waiting to happen here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring out of the sink, and that woman is just standing there, doing nothing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already in the puddle, and she doesn’t even seem to feel it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is going to be a slippery mess soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those kids are making it worse by climbing on that unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to fall, and the girl is just encouraging him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can already see the stool tipping over in my mind.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The mom needs to turn around and see what’s going on before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But she’s so focused on that plate, she might as well be in another world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is just a recipe for chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR
